actions.recommendation: Regular breast self-examinations are recommended. If you notice any irregularities to consult your doctor.
Regular Pap smear screening helps detect any abnormalities early & improves management outcomes. Your recent Pap Smears have been normal. You can book your next follow-up with your GP or Gynae.
Mammogram screening also becomes important as you get older (>40 years).

A few areas that we identified to be optimised include developing an exercise routine as well as improving diet (avoiding high sugar intake). Making these adjustments will have a positive impact on your general well-being & future health.
